libs.integration.aws.imageprocessing

Interface DataWriter<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - data object
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    S3DataWriter, S3ImageWriter

    public interface DataWriter<T>
    Basic interface to write data
    Author:
    Kuldeep

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean write(T data, DataSource source)
      method to be implemented by subclasses to write to the destination according to provided data source.

    • Method Detail

      • write

        boolean write(T data,
              DataSource source)
       throws java.io.IOException
        method to be implemented by subclasses to write to the destination according to provided data source. See implementation S3DataWriter and S3ImageWriter
        Parameters:
        data - object to writeto
        source - DataSource
        Returns:
        sucess/failture
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - any exception
